name: Cannon Crew
description:
Play with a team of 1-4 and work together to stop the enemy breaching your castle walls. Feel free to get competitive within your team - the more gold you can snatch or jobs you complete will give you a higher score than the others - but don't get too distracted from the incoming horde!Game Modes- Story Mode


- Survival

- PuzzlesDifficultyThe difficulty changes depending on number of players in-game. If you're playing with a team of 4 then enemy waves will arrive quicker and be harder to defeat - Singleplayer means enemies will move slower and take less hits.Planned Features- Online Co-Op

- Uploading Custom Levels to Steam Workshop
